lyrics.EngStr: Although I often dream of you
Still have no clue

lyrics.ChnStr: 外面正在下著雨 今天是星期幾?
lyrics.Pinyin: 外[wài]面[miàn]正[zhèng]在[zài]下[xià]著[zhù]雨[yǔ] 今[jīn]天[tiān]是[shì]星[xīng]期[qī]幾[jī]?
lyrics.EngStr: It’s raining outside; what day of the week is it today?

lyrics.ChnStr: But I don't know 你去哪裡
lyrics.Pinyin: But I don't know 你[nǐ]去[qù]哪[nǎ]裡[lǐ]
lyrics.EngStr: But I don’t know where you’ve gone
Although I never doubted you
I’m still uneasy and unsettled, oh
Who is your one and only?
Forgive me for doubting myself

lyrics.ChnStr: 我明白我要的愛會把我寵壞
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]明[míng]白[bái]我[wǒ]要[yào]的[de]愛[ài]會[huì]把[bǎ]我[wǒ]寵[chǒng]壞[huài]
lyrics.EngStr: I understand that the love I want will spoil me

lyrics.ChnStr: 像一個小孩只懂在你懷裡壞
lyrics.Pinyin: 像[xiàng]一[yī]個[gè]小[xiǎo]孩[hái]只[zhī]懂[dǒng]在[zài]你[nǐ]懷[huái]裡[lǐ]壞[huài]
lyrics.EngStr: Like a child who only knows to be spoiled in your arms
The love you want isn’t just dependence

lyrics.ChnStr: 要像個大男孩 風吹又日曬 生活自由自在
lyrics.Pinyin: 要[yào]像[xiàng]個[gè]大[dà]男[nán]孩[hái] 風[fēng]吹[chuī]又[yòu]日[rì]曬[shài] 生[shēng]活[huó]自[zì]由[yóu]自[zì]在[zài]
lyrics.EngStr: You want someone like a grown boy—wind-blown and sun-exposed, living freely
Although I never doubted you
I’m still uneasy and unsettled, oh
Who is your one and only?
Forgive me for doubting myself

lyrics.ChnStr: 我明白我要的愛會把我寵壞
lyrics.Pinyin: 我[wǒ]明[míng]白[bái]我[wǒ]要[yào]的[de]愛[ài]會[huì]把[bǎ]我[wǒ]寵[chǒng]壞[huài]
lyrics.EngStr: I understand that the love I want will spoil me
